docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: AN OPEN ADOPTION By Lincoln Caplan. 150 pp. New York: Farrar, Straus & Giroux. $17.95.
docs.snippet: LEAD:    AN OPEN ADOPTION    By Lincoln Caplan.    150 pp. New York:    Farrar, Straus & Giroux. $17.95.

byline.original: By PHYLLIS THEROUX; Phyllis Theroux, who has two adopted children, is the author of ''Night Lights: Bedtime Stories for Parents in the Dark.''
